original_text: The Devil now took Jesus to Jerusalem. He took him to stand on the highest part of the temple. Then he said to Jesus, ‘If you are the Son of God, jump down from here to the ground.
korean_text: 또 이끌고 예루살렘으로 가서 성전 꼭대기에 세우고 이르되 네가 만일 하나님의 아들이어든 여기서 뛰어내리라

sentences.original_text: The Devil now took Jesus to Jerusalem.
He took him to stand on the highest part of the temple.
sentences.korean_translation: 그는 그를 성전의 가장 높은 곳에 세웠습니다.

sentences.original_text: 'If you are the Son of God,
jump down from here to the ground.
